titleStmt.title: A Full and perfect account of the seizing seven of K. James's officers, viz. Captain Vaughan, Frogmorton, Whinuell, Burges, Sidmore, Brookes and Yearburrough who were bound for France with treasonable letters, and now are in custody in Bell Savage Yard by Ludgate till their examination

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R.H. and H. Jones ...,

notesStmt.note: "Licensed by J. Fraiser and entered according to order, 1690."
Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
